text: @HillaryClinton This Clown in office is responsible for the Coronavirus deaths. He sat on his A** and called it a Democrat Hoax while at his stupid hillbilly rallies thousands were dying. He was playing golf and didn’t give a S**T. He can’t be gone soon enough! He’s an embarrassment!
